primary.context: The user wants to make a new reservation or book a stay.
primary.detail: The AI correctly identified the out-of-scope request and attempted a transfer, but no human agents were available in the queue.

steps: Caller requested to book a vacation.
Agent identified the request as out-of-scope and offered a transfer to concierge.
Caller waited in the queue for approximately 25 minutes.
AI re-engaged to inform the caller no representatives were available and ended the call.

actions.detail: Transfer to concierge failed due to no agents available after long hold.

insights.summary: The customer wanted to book a vacation, which is out-of-scope for the AI. The agent correctly routed the call to the concierge department, but the transfer failed after a 25-minute wait because no human agents were available.
insights.verbatim: Reservations. I want to reserve vacation, book a vacation.
